titleStmt.title: The main points of church-government and discipline; plainly and modestly handled by way of question and answer. Very useful to such as either want money to buy, or leasure to read larger tracts.
titleStmt.author: Love, Christopher, 1618-1651.

titleStmt.title: The main points of church-government and discipline; plainly and modestly handled by way of question and answer. Very useful to such as either want money to buy, or leasure to read larger tracts.
titleStmt.author: Love, Christopher, 1618-1651.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. for Luke Favvne, and are to be sold at his shop at the Parrot ni [sic] pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A plain platform of Presbyterial government.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 17 1648"; the 9 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
